attributes.action: Stop the planning on the 02 centre in finchley road
attributes.additional_details: Since if we go to camden council they would not do anything  since they want the money and dont care about the people that live around it especially if you work in the 02 centre in one of the business so I am asking the government to stop in its tracks because they want to plan to demolish the centre an put blocks of flat on the car park for 2,000 people so help us
attributes.background: I want the government to stop the planning to demolish the 02 centre in north west London becuase it will destroy the niegbourhood and it will increase crime and it is the nearest shopping mall in finchley road the next one is in brent cross which isnt convenient for the people that live around it

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
